## Module overview

* investigate a new mathematical topic
* develop communication skills
* independent study
* critical analysis
* develop programming skills

##  Structure

* work independently with your project supervisor. You need to discuss a meeting plan.
* weekly sessions developing communication/writing/programming skills.
* 2 p.m. on Monday is Maths seminar - you are encouraged to attend but it is optional.s


##  Week 1 and 2 - Tasks

- Get assigned your project
- Set up a meeting with your project advisor
- Devise a plan for how you are going to work on your project.
- Read Chapter 1 of lecture notes
- Start using Quarto (Chapter 2 of lecture notes)

## Module assessment

* presentation
* interim report
* poster
* final report + viva

Template projects and presentations will be available.

## How did projects get assigned?

* Algorithm maximises overall satisfaction (tries to get as many students as high up preference list as possible) and is constrained by supervisor workload
* If you are not satisfied, please come and discuss with me.

## Feedback 

* Formative assessment
    * Feedback on submitted weekly work
    * Feedback on practice presentation sessions
    * Feedback from your supervisor in meetings
    * Feedback on documents that your supervisor reads in advance of submission
* Summative assessment
    * Receive an email with grades and feedback from examiners
